name: Kevin.
description:
Yeah, cool Game. I wanted to do something on Scratch 3 and here it is. BTW now the 

,,Demo" is done. There will be no more Updates untill the Release. PLS if you find a Bug let me know. We don't want to have Cyberkevin you know! XD (This was a Joke) also you can write in the Comments what you want to see in Game. 

I used Sheeptester to trandfer tge Scratch 3 file into an HTML file.

Have fun!
